analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The self of all buddhas are the five transcendent lords.

original: rdo rje 'dzin chen ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin chen ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The great vajra-holder are Yamantaka and so forth.

original: gnas ni dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can yin pas so //
analyzed: gnas ni dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can yin pas so //
translated: The place is the nature of the mandala.

original: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs byung ngo //
translated: Thus, this Bhagavat, who is the essence of the Guhyasamaja, is the origin of the method of all buddhas.

original: de nyid chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos dkar po thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thun mong gi chos kyi sku gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bcom ldan 'das de nyid chos dkar po thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thun mong gi chos kyi sku gang yin pa ste /
translated: That is the reality of phenomena. The Bhagavat is the suchness of all pure phenomena, the dharmakaya that is the commonality of all buddhas.üîΩ

original: gang gi dbang gis de rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i skus bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar thug pa ste thabs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi dbang gis de rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i skus bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i mthar thug pa ste thabs las byung ba'o //
translated: That is the reality of phenomena. The Bhagavat is the reality of the purity of all virtuous things, the Dharma Body common to all Buddhas, which is the ultimate perfection of benefit for self and others through the Enjoyment Body and the Emanation Body.üîΩIt is the result of the means.

original: thabs bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi nang nas ci gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: thabs bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi nang nas ci gcig gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ram /
translated: Which of these four means that are taught is the one by which one realizes Buddhahood?

original: 'on te ma lus pas yin zhes 'di dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma lus pas yin zhes 'di dpyad par bya'o //
translated: Or is it by all of them? This should be analyzed.

original: ma lus pas zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //
analyzed: ma lus pas zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //
translated: The conclusion is that it is by all of them.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gsum pos rim gyis de dang de'i khyad par grub pa yod na bzhi par 'bras bu ma lus pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ltar na bsnyen pa ni chos thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam nyid dang nye bar sgrub pa la ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang sgrub pa la ni dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nyid dang sgrub pa chen po la ni shin tu rnam par dag
analyzed: gsum pos rim gyis de dang de'i khyad par grub pa yod na bzhi par 'bras bu ma lus pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro // de ltar na bsnyen pa ni chos thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam nyid dang nye bar sgrub pa la ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang sgrub pa la ni dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nyid dang sgrub pa chen po la ni shin tu rnam par dag
translated: If the three, the near approach and so on, are accomplished in order, then the fourth, the great accomplishment, is accomplished.

original: pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du mngon sum du gyur pa byang chub yin no //
analyzed: pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du mngon sum du gyur pa byang chub yin no //
translated: Thus, the near approach is the direct realization of the realm of all things as mere representation. The accomplishment is the direct realization of the realm of pure space. The great accomplishment is the direct realization of the realm of very pure space.

original: gzhan yang bsnyen pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khams rgyas pa dang / nye bar sgrub pa la ni skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa la ni dag pa dang sgrub pa chen po la shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang yang dag par ston pa la dbang du gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsnyen pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khams rgyas pa dang / nye bar sgrub pa la ni skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa la ni dag pa dang sgrub pa chen po la shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang yang dag par ston pa la dbang du gyur pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, in the near approach, the realm of the qualities of the Buddha increases; in the accomplishment, they are born; in the great accomplishment, they are very pure; and in the demonstration, one becomes a master.

original: gzhan yang re zhig bsnyen pas ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa nyid dang / nye bar sgrub pa thob pa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sa bdun dang / sgrub pas thob pa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa rnam par smin pa'i sa gsum dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang re zhig bsnyen pas ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa nyid dang / nye bar sgrub pa thob pa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sa bdun dang / sgrub pas thob pa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa rnam par smin pa'i sa gsum dang /
translated: Moreover, one should explain that the stage of devoted engagement is attained through the approach, the seven stages of pure superior intention beginning with the Joyous are attained through the accomplishment, and the three stages of evolutionary maturity beginning with the Immovable are attained through the practice.

original: sgrub pa chen pos thob par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis nyid yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen pos thob par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis nyid yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: And the state of buddhahood is to be attained through the great practice.

original: gzhan yang dngos grub mchog gi phyir zhing du gyur ba ni bsnyen pa'i don yin la /üîΩde ma lus pa ma yin par sgrub pa ni nye bar sgrub pa'i don @114a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos grub mchog gi phyir zhing du gyur ba ni bsnyen pa'i don yin la / de ma lus pa ma yin par sgrub pa ni nye bar sgrub pa'i don @114a * //
translated: Moreover, the approach is the means of attaining the supreme feat.üîΩThe accomplishment is the means of attaining the remainder of that.

original: yin zhing ma lus par sgrub pa ni sgrub pa'i don yin la /
analyzed: yin zhing ma lus par sgrub pa ni sgrub pa'i don yin la /
translated: The practice is the means of attaining the remainder of that.

original: shin tu sgrub pa ni sgrub pa chen po'i don yin te /
analyzed: shin tu sgrub pa ni sgrub pa chen po'i don yin te /
translated: And the great practice is the means of attaining the supreme feat.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa dang longs spyod la dbang pa la longs spyod pa de sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa dang longs spyod la dbang pa la longs spyod pa de sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the means of attaining the enjoyment of the extremely pure and the mastery of enjoyment.

original: bsnyen pa ni /
analyzed: bsnyen pa ni /
translated: The approach is the means of attaining the supreme feat.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
translated: This is the body of the Tathagata.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni //
translated: The mind of the Vajra Holder,

original: chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang //
analyzed: chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang //
translated: and the speech of the supreme Dharma Holder,

original: tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur //
translated: are attained in this very life.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what is said.

original: nye bar sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: nye bar sgrub pa ni /
translated: The near attainment:

original: rdo rje gsum mkha' 'dra ba yis //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum mkha' 'dra ba yis //
translated: By the space-like three vajras,

original: byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur //
translated: enlightenment is attained by this.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho //
translated: The ocean of victors, the bodhisattvas,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog des thob ;üîΩ/ ces gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog des thob ; / ces gsungs pa yin te /
translated: are attained by the supreme Vajrasattva.

original: 'dir rgyal ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
analyzed: 'dir rgyal ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so //
translated: Here, the victors are the qualities of the Buddha.

original: bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bco lnga pa las /
analyzed: bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bco lnga pa las /
translated: The result of accomplishment, the fifteenth:

original: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of concentration and mantra,

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur //
translated: one becomes like the light of the Buddha.

original: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
analyzed: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
translated: Immediately after that,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' 'od 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' 'od 'drar 'gyur //
translated: one becomes like the light of Vajrasattva.

original: rgyal po chos rnams thams cad mtshungs //
analyzed: rgyal po chos rnams thams cad mtshungs //
translated: The king, all dharmas are equal,

original: 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa //
analyzed: 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa //
translated: fulfilling desire and liberation.

original: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag / sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag / sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: He is the lord of Vajradharma, and he abides in the ten stages.

original: 'dir sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Here, he is equal to the Buddha because he is the lord of the ten stages.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: But he is not the Buddha himself.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'od dang 'dra ba zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'od dang 'dra ba zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that he is like the light of Vairochana, etc.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyid dang mnyam pa yin gyi shin tu rnam par dag pa dag ni ma yin pa des na chos rnams kun dang mtshungs zhes pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyid dang mnyam pa yin gyi shin tu rnam par dag pa dag ni ma yin pa des na chos rnams kun dang mtshungs zhes pa yin no //
translated: He is equal to all the dharmas of the Buddha, but not completely pure. Therefore, it is said that he is equal to all dharmas.

original: rgyal po ni rnam par mi rtog pa la dbang du gyur pa dang zhing la dbang du gyur pa dang ye shes la dbang du gyur pa dang las la dbang du gyur bas so //
analyzed: rgyal po ni rnam par mi rtog pa la dbang du gyur pa dang zhing la dbang du gyur pa dang ye shes la dbang du gyur pa dang las la dbang du gyur bas so //
translated: The king is so called because he has mastery over non-conceptuality, mastery over the field, mastery over wisdom, and mastery over karma.

original: slob ma'i sa ni thams cad 'dod pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: slob ma'i sa ni thams cad 'dod pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The stage of the disciple is so called because it is associated with all desires.

original: de'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba ni 'dod pa'i thar ba ste /üîΩder rab sgrub pa ni de thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba ni 'dod pa'i thar ba ste / der rab sgrub pa ni de thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The liberation of desire is the liberation of the desire realm.üîΩThe great practice is the practice of the desire realm.

original: sgrub pa chen po'i 'bras bu ni bcu drug pa las /
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i 'bras bu ni bcu drug pa las /
translated: The result of the great practice is the sixteenth stage.

original: dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni //
translated: The crest-jewel of all powers

original: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur //
translated: is the lord of the wish-fulfilling jewel.üîΩThe supreme practice of Buddha-enlightenment

original: sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog / sangs rgyas rdo rjer rab bsgoms pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog / sangs rgyas rdo rjer rab bsgoms pa'o // zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: is the meditation on the Buddha-vajra.

original: 'dir dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni rtse mo ste /
analyzed: 'dir dngos grub thams cad gtsug tor ni rtse mo ste /
translated: Here, the crest-jewel of all powers is the peak.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya @114b ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya @114b ba'i don to //
translated: It means the state of perfect complete Buddhahood.

original: de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the spontaneous, uninterrupted engagement of the Buddha-body in all ways, because it is similar to that wish-fulfilling jewel-king.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni mchog ste dam pa'i sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni mchog ste dam pa'i sgrub pa'o //
translated: That perfect complete enlightenment is the supreme, the best practice.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgoms pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgoms pa ste /
translated: The Buddha is the vajra meditation.

original: sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin la /
translated: The Buddha is the lord of the mandala.

original: de las rdo rje rab tu bsgom pa ni gsang ba gsum po dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam rnam par rab tu phye nas bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de las rdo rje rab tu bsgom pa ni gsang ba gsum po dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam rnam par rab tu phye nas bsgom pa ste /
translated: The vajra meditation from him is the meditation on the three secrets, having distinguished the mandala deities.

original: sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the great achievement.

original: de bas na tshogs pa bzhi po ma lus pa 'di dag gi rim pa 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi ma lus pas ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bas na tshogs pa bzhi po ma lus pa 'di dag gi rim pa 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi ma lus pas ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, by this very process of the four assemblies, one realizes buddhahood, not by any other process.

original: rim pa gzhan gyis kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: rim pa gzhan gyis kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nges pa yin no //
translated: This is the certainty.

original: gal te 'di ltar re zhig sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa chen po nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur na de nyid kyis chog mong /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar re zhig sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa chen po nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur na de nyid kyis chog mong /
translated: If one were to attain buddhahood by the great achievement alone, then that would suffice.

original: gzhan gsum pos ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gsum pos ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What would be the use of the other three?

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas sa la 'jug pa'i ched kyi sbyor ba gang yin pa de nyid chog na mos pas spyod pa la sogs pas sa bcur gtogs pa'i sbyor ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas sa la 'jug pa'i ched kyi sbyor ba gang yin pa de nyid chog na mos pas spyod pa la sogs pas sa bcur gtogs pa'i sbyor ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
translated: If the application of bodhisattvas to enter the buddha ground is sufficient, why would they not accept that other applications included in the ten levels such as the level of earnest aspiration and so on are unnecessary?

original: yang na sa snga mar gtogs pa'i sbyor ba med par sbyor ba phyi ma phyi mar byed par nus pa ma yin te rim pa ni nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na sa snga mar gtogs pa'i sbyor ba med par sbyor ba phyi ma phyi mar byed par nus pa ma yin te rim pa ni nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, without the application subsumed by the earlier levels, one is unable to perform the later applications because the sequence is definite.

original: byed pa nyid 'jig pa yin pa de nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa nyid 'jig pa yin pa de nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the agent itself is destroyed.

original: 'o na yin zhe na /üîΩde'i gzugs brnyan tam yin te /
analyzed: 'o na yin zhe na / de'i gzugs brnyan tam yin te /
translated: What is it?

original: de'i gzugs brnyan ni de'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i gzugs brnyan ni de'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It is a reflection of it, but it is not the performance of its function.üîΩTherefore they are not fruitless.

original: de bas na de rnams 'bras bu med pa ma yin no snyam na de bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa la yang snga ma snga ma med par nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan tsam yin gyi de nyid
analyzed: de bas na de rnams 'bras bu med pa ma yin no snyam na de bzhin du bsnyen pa la sogs pa la yang snga ma snga ma med par nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs brnyan tsam yin gyi de nyid
translated: In the same way, if one performs the later applications such as the level of ascertainment without the earlier applications such as the level of earnest aspiration, that is merely a reflection of the earlier applications.

original: ni ma yin pa de ltar na de las 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ni ma yin pa de ltar na de las 'bras bu 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: If it were not so, then the effect would not be accomplished from that.

original: de bas na gcig kyang don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gcig kyang don med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, none of them is purposeless.

original: 'o na ji ltar na sgrub pa chen po las sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩzhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar na sgrub pa chen po las sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro // zhes brjod ce na /
translated: But how is Buddhahood attained from the Great Achievement?

original: gsum po dag las rim gyis rtog pa'i sal gnas pa des mthar thug pa thob par byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gsum po dag las rim gyis rtog pa'i sal gnas pa des mthar thug pa thob par byed pa'i phyir //
translated: It is said that from the three, the mind gradually attains the ultimate by means of the state of contemplation.

original: yid kyi chos gang dag goms pas bogs phyin bar gyur pa de dag shin tu goms par byas na na rab kyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur par srid de /
analyzed: yid kyi chos gang dag goms pas bogs phyin bar gyur pa de dag shin tu goms par byas na na rab kyi mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur par srid de /
translated: Those mental dharmas which are cultivated and perfected, when they are cultivated to the utmost, can attain the ultimate perfection.

original: bram ze gtsang mar spyod pa rnams @115a * //
analyzed: bram ze gtsang mar spyod pa rnams @115a * //
translated: Like the Brahmans who practice purity,

original: thod pa can la dga' ba bzhin no //
analyzed: thod pa can la dga' ba bzhin no //
translated: who delight in the skull.

original: bdag cag lta bu'i snying rje dang shes rab la sogs pa yang de lta bur gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: bdag cag lta bu'i snying rje dang shes rab la sogs pa yang de lta bur gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: Compassion, wisdom, etc. are like that for us. This is a natural inference.

original: de bas na 'di ni rang rgyud rigs mthun pa rnams la snying rje la sogs pa rab kyi mthar thug par srid par rjes su dpog pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni rang rgyud rigs mthun pa rnams la snying rje la sogs pa rab kyi mthar thug par srid par rjes su dpog pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is an inference of the ultimate limit of existence of compassion and so on in the homogeneous continuum of oneself.

original: de dag nyid kyis de rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang byang chub tu 'gyur bar srid pa yang rjes su dpag go //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyis de rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang byang chub tu 'gyur bar srid pa yang rjes su dpag go //
translated: By those very means, one infers the possibility of those very persons becoming the qualities of a Buddha and enlightenment.

original: 'gyur ba de yang nyan thos dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis ni sdug bsngal dang dka' thub kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams goms par byas pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsgrub pas so //
analyzed: 'gyur ba de yang nyan thos dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis ni sdug bsngal dang dka' thub kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams goms par byas pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsgrub pas so //
translated: That transformation is accomplished in three measureless kalpas by means of the Sravakayana and the Perfection Vehicle, through the practice of the perfections in all aspects of suffering and austerity.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyis ni sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i thabs dpag tu med pas sngags kyi lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyis ni sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i thabs dpag tu med pas sngags kyi lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs /
translated: By means of the Yoga Tantra, it is accomplished by the blessings of the mantras and deities through the immeasurable means of mantra, seal, and so on.

original: bde ba dang bde bar spyod pas ring po mi thogs par tshe 'di nyid la rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas /
analyzed: bde ba dang bde bar spyod pas ring po mi thogs par tshe 'di nyid la rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas /
